apoc_seed1: You are standing outside an old rundown gas station at the edge of town. There are old broken cars surrounding the gas station and on the road. You are extremely hungry and haven't eaten in a few days.
apoc_seed2: You find a car with the keys in the ignition and try to start it. Nothing happens. You keep looking and find another car that looks like it might work. You manage to get the engine started.
apoc_seed3: As you leave the store you notice movement out behind your car. A man steps out with a hungry look in his eyes. His clothes are in tatters and he is carrying a crowbar.
apoc_seed4: You walk for two hours and take a break. You've left the town you were in and are now in a more rural area. There's a farmhouse to your right and a forest on your left.

apoc_seed1: look in the gas station for food.
apoc_seed2: drive around looking for any people or stores that might have supplies.

apoc_seed4: go in the farmhouse and look for food.

apoc_seed1: You search the gas station for food, but find nothing you can eat.
apoc_seed2: You drive around the town and see many boarded up buildings, but no people. Eventually you find a store that you think might have supplies.
apoc_seed3: You run forward to attack the man. His crowbar crashes into your chest and you fall to the ground. He kicks you a few times and then grabs your granola bars and runs off.
apoc_seed4: You try to open the farmhouse front door, but it's locked. There's a broken window on the right and a shed behind the house.

apoc_seed2: go inside the store and see if there are any supplies.

apoc_seed1: You search the cars for food, you search three without success, but in the glove compartment of the fourth you find a box of crackers.
